page.title: 18HOME LIFE - THE FAMILY
page.content: Most of the bungalows and houses down the Old Bawtry Road are occupied by{families.}One family has{five {members}-a mother,father and three daughters aged 20 yrs, 18 yrs. and 15 yrs. The{eldest daughter}left school to work as a{secretary}in a Doncaster office.{The 18 year old daughter}has just sat her 'A' level exams and is waiting to go to{college}in Manchester to study for a{Social Science Degree. The{youngest daughter}is in the fourth year at the local{comprehensive {school.}The{mother}of the family doesn't have a job,but the{father works for an{oil rig}company and spends many months a year out of the country.
